channel.title: vpn on ScienceChronicle
channel.description: Recent content in vpn on ScienceChronicle

item.title: OpenWRT with WireGuard server which is connected through OpenVPN
item.description: We setup a wireguard server on an OpenWRT router. We generate a setup file for the client. The wireguard server itself we connect through a VPN. The VPN itself can be socked through TOR (we don’t discuss this in the article). Generate keys umask go= wg genkey | tee wgserver.key | wg pubkey > wgserver.pub wg genkey | tee wgclient.key | wg pubkey > wgclient.pub wg genpsk > wgclient.psk Setup wireguard server Note, wireguard server is actually a kernel module and there is no a special application to be run.
